name: Mobile Potential
overview:
Mobile Potential offers a number of unique Prepaid Mobile Services to simplify Prepaid transactions.

We provide a SaaS prepaid distribution service to both retailers and Mobile Networks. For retailers we make it simple to sell Prepaid Airtime as we remove the PIN process, replacing PINs with an online PINless Airtime transaction.

We increase the distribution of Airtime for Mobile Networks as we enable Airtime to be sold at many more retail points.

We have also patented an “Airtime 4 Change” process where Prepaid Airtime is supplied to the customer as an alternative to change in the form of cash.

We have offices in Charlotte (USA) and Cape Town (South Africa.)

Mobile Potential was a category winner at the 2012 Charlotte Venture Challenge.http://charlotteventurechallenge.com/
